pkgmetadata.longdescription: The freqtop tool will show all logical cores in your system, with the bars representing the frequency scale. The green bar is at the minimum frequency level. The yellow bar is at the base frequency level. The red bar is at the turbo frequency level. The orange ticks will show the load for each core. When at the top, the core is fully utilized. When at the bottom, the core is fully idle.
